name: The Cursed Village
description:
The Cursed Village is a singleplayer survival horror game. During your adventure, you have to explore and solve riddles to get the three stones to stop the curse. But you're not alone, monsters are roaming around in the village, looking for prey. Do you think you can survive against them?

You wake up in a medieval village, not knowing what's happening you search in houses but something isn't right, the village is empty but then a monstrous howl can be heard. Your brain and your survival instinc are the keys to stay alive in this adventure but you have to do everything you need to escape and leave this place behind.

Available languages: French & English

Game created by Thibaud Hernandez

Thanks to alexmario5 for translating the game into english.
